content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown)
- Inserter (position unknown) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position unknown) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### Copper plate mine at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position unknown) and a furnace (position unknown)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft iron gear wheels, you need sufficient iron plates.

### Errors when extracting items from entities
- Make sure to check the inventory of the entity you are extracting from to ensure it contains the items you want to extract.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for occupied tiles to avoid placement errors.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
